component.name: OptionsSlider
component.script:
sub init() m.top.visible = false
panel = m.top.findNode("panel") panel.panelSize = "small" panel.leftPosition = 0 panel.focusable = true panel.hasNextPanel = false panel.leftOnly = true
list = m.top.findNode("panelList")
panel.list = list
bd = m.top.findNode("backdrop") bd.color = "#101010DD" bd.translation = [0, 0] dimensions = m.top.getScene().currentDesignResolution bd.width = 575 bd.height = dimensions.height end sub
sub setFields() options = m.top.options row = m.top.findNode("fieldList")
row.removeChildren(row.getChildren(-1, 0))
row.appendChildren(options) end sub
function onKeyEvent(key as string, press as boolean) as boolean if not press then return false
if key = "options" m.top.visible = false m.top.escape = true return true end if
return false end function
